title: Happy Birthday, Kayochin!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Kayochin! Happy birthday, congrats! It's the day Kayochin was born, so today is the best day in the entire year nya--!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, thank you, Rin-chan. But you've congratulated me about 10 times already~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Huh, is that so? But you know, Rin loves congratulating Kayochin, so Rin wants to say it no matter how many times nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, I'll also say thank you again<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Aaah, it would be great if every day was Kayochin's birthday. That way Rin can always celebrate Kayochin nya-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeh!? Does that mean I'll turn into a grandma sooner than you, Rin-chan? I wanted us to become grandmas together, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, if it's like that, then Rin doesn't want it too nya! Absolutely not nya! It's better to have a once in a year birthday after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, that's good. Because I want to always be next to you, Rin-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Kayochin....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Rin-chan....!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
